bibl.title: Et Hominum Et Deorum ... Laudes (?): A Hypothesis about the Organisation of Pindar's Paean-Book.
bibl.note: Suggests that the book of Paeans was organised into "praises of gods", i.e. Apollo (at least mostly) [sections D, C and B of P. Oxy. V, 841 (= Pack2 1361) (Pa. X, VIII, VIIb)], and "praises of men" [section A (Pa. II-VII)].
RUTHERFORD Ian, Et Hominum Et Deorum ... Laudes (?): A Hypothesis about the Organisation of Pindar's Paean-Book.
